parameters.year: a numeric vector for the year
parameters.rgdpo: Output-side real GDP at chained PPPs (in million 2017 USD)
parameters.rgdpe: Expenditure-side real GDP at chained PPPs (in million 2017 USD)
parameters.rnna: Capital stock at constant 2017 national prices (in million 2017 USD)
parameters.hc: Index of human capital per person, based on years of schooling and returns to education
parameters.labsh: Share of labor compensation in GDP at current national prices
parameters.rgdpna: Real GDP at constant 2011 national prices (in million 2017 USD)
parameters.avh: Average annual hours worked by persons engaged.

title: Penn World Table (10.0) Macroeconomic Data for Select Countries, 1950-2019
description:
Description
These are some macroeconomic data for 21 select (rich) countries. I've used
these data before to discuss issues of grouping and skew in cross-sectional data.
reference: Taken from the pwt10 package. See: https://www.rug.nl/ggdc/
format: A data frame with 1470 observations on the following 11 variables.
